definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Continue to hold the thermometer in place while taking his temperature.
sentences.chinese: 量体温的过程中要一直拿住体温计。

sentences.english: Oh, Iknow. Give me the thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我知道了，给我体温计看一下。

sentences.english: Let me take your temperature with a thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 让我拿体温计来量一下你的体温。

sentences.english: Put a thermometer in the mouth.
The forehead thermometer is much easier to use.
sentences.chinese: 这个前额测温的体温计愈加便当运用。

sentences.english: I need a thermometer so I can take my son's temperature.
sentences.chinese: 我需要体温计来量我儿子的体温。

sentences.english: Ideally, take two separate readings 20 minutes apart, and check that the thermometer is clean.
sentences.chinese: 最好是在20分钟后，让体温计清零后再量一次体温。

sentences.english: Let me measure your temperature. pls stick that in your mouth.
sentences.chinese: 让我来量一下你的体温，请将体温计含在嘴里。

sentences.english: Put the thermometer in a safe place until it is ready to be used again.
sentences.chinese: 将体温计放在安全的地方以备下次使用。

sentences.english: Take the temperature orally (by mouth) or by ear thermometer.
sentences.chinese: 测量口腔温度，或者用耳道体温计。

sentences.english: Would you put the thermometer under you arm, please?
sentences.chinese: 请你把体温计放在你的腋下好吗？

sentences.english: Put this thermometer under you tongue.
sentences.chinese: 把体温计放在您的舌头下面。

sentences.english: Put this thermometer under your tongue.
sentences.chinese: 把体温计放在您的舌头下面。

definition: antipyretic (drug to reduce fever, such as sulfanilamide)
variant of 棉籤|棉签[mian2 qian1]/cotton swab
